original_text: In the fifth year of King Rehoboam, because they had been unfaithful to the Lord, Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem
korean_text: 그들이 여호와께 범죄하였으므로 르호보암 왕 제오년에 애굽 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 치러 올라오니

sentences.original_text: In the fifth year of King Rehoboam
because they had been unfaithful to the Lord
Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 치러 올라왔더라
